Damn. I bought KSP for 18 dollars on official site... I started this game on 0.17!!!

Bought it on the official site also... $30..... worth every damn penny!

Bought it on the official site also... $30..... worth every damn penny!

So true...

I would like to thank Squad for listening so much the community. Integrating community mods and having mod developers come and help develop the game really is what makes KSP stand out from all the other games.

I don't know if we say it often enough, but this is a big thank you to all of the devs for working so hard on making this game such a great experience for all of us. The amount of effort you put in, and your devotion to providing us with such a great product and experience is outstanding. While we all know this is also your job, I think I am speaking for everyone when I say that we are thankful for everything you guys are doing, and you should be very proud of your work.

Again, thank you!

Stephen Halby
Thank you for making this game! And for listening to the community.

Hey guys, rock on. I've been waiting for the Tycoon release, and it's finally here. Thanks a bunch! Finally no more building castles in the sandbox, the army men have arrived! It's time to do it right!

Woot! Having a blast with this release.

Thank you Squad teamÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ you've done a wonderful job, getting us a big brand new release just in time for ChristmasÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ my wish for you is that *YOU* get a holiday off with your friends and families. Enjoy this Christmas seasonÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ you've just made it amazingly enjoyable for the rest of us
Thank you Squad! for the brilliant beta! You have far exceeded every expectation that I ever had for any sort of game. I hope you guys have a great holiday!

Gotta say, I love this game like no other. I've spent many hours in it. I've had negative and positive experiences, but always a "good" experience none the less. I came here from Orbiter. which was my personal favorite for years until KSP came along.. You guys have done an outstanding job. I've seen good persona from the Dev team just in your "Daily Kerbal" posts. Excellent responses within a reasonable time concerning all requests or suggestions, whether they were implemented or refused, at-least there was an answer. You've never disappeared behind the game and made it a smokescreen between you and your community. It's very rare that I sing praises about a game developing company... actually, I don't think I ever have. So you can consider yourselves exceptional as far as I'm concerned. lol.. BTW, Gratz to those of you with marriages and new family additions. Been seeing a few of those recently.. Anyway, I hope you all have a happy holiday, and a great New year.

PS: after KSP is finished, I'm interested to see what you guys plan to do to top it. It can't stop here. You guys really have some talent and seem to work well together. Don't let it fall between the cracks after you're finished with KSP!

Edited December 23, 2014 by Talavar
KSP just keeps getting better and better! Loving the contract-driven space program with the very specific missions. Thanks Squad!!
Thanks for making such a great game squad and your continued work on updates. Happy holidays you deserve it and a Happy new year

Well its the holiday season and since so much of this board is begging and whining I thought along with a huge sincere thanks to Squad for pouring so much of their time, love, and soul into such a charming and wonderful game, we could all pick a few little things to say thanks for.

First, thanks for the early 9.0 release! I wasn't expecting it and it couldn't have been easy. Its certainly warmed my holiday vacation, so thanks.

Second, thanks for the new Mk3 parts! They're killer looking and Ive wanted big giant cargo bays for so long. They're great!

Third, Thanks for the more recent navball enhancements! They're crazy super handy

Fourth, thanks for letting me see struts and fuel-lines as they're being placed! Its a small detail, but its really handy when I snaking a fuel line through the inside of a jungle of radial mounted boosters

Fifth, thanks for the Ion buff. It was a little while ago now but as a solar-sailor enthusiast this made a huge difference for me. Thanks!

This is by no means an exhaustive list, just a few little less noticed things I really appreciate. Hope you all are having a wonderful holiday
I was thinking of posting something similar. They really pushed hard to get 0.90 out in time for Christmas and it's been worth it. Lots of good new features big and small. Three Cheers to Squad.
0.90 has been brilliant so far. The game is looking brilliant and will most likely get even better during 2015. Well done, Squad!
Happy new years to Squad, and thanks for several years of fun with this game already (see my signature line.) Looking forward to many years more of fun, especially as my toddler grows up!
And thanks now, for the upcoming 1.0 release!!! I am sooo excited to see what Squad has in store for us!

I'd Like to post in here after thousands of hours of gameplay to really thanks Squad for the Marvelous Experience that brought my fantasy outside the Atmosphere. Now the Moon and the stars are somehow closer to us.
